definitions.definition: The act of touching physically; being in close association.

definitions.example: I haven't been in contact with her for years.

definitions.definition: A nodule designed to connect a device with something else.
definitions.example: Touch the contact to ground and read the number again.

definitions.definition: Someone with whom one is in communication.
definitions.example: The salesperson had a whole binder full of contacts for potential clients.

definitions.definition: A device designed for repetitive connections.

definitions.example: I bought myself a new contact ball last week

definitions.definition: The plane between two adjacent bodies of dissimilar rock.
To touch; to come into physical contact with.
definitions.example: The side of the car contacted the pedestrian.

definitions.definition: To establish communication with something or someone
definitions.example: I am trying to contact my sister.
